nodes.text: The Wanderers were a nomadic collective that traveled in a convoy of seven heavily modified Xiytiar-class heavy transports. During the Imperial Era, the group entered a star system unannounced, identified themselves and then moored to open their extensive bazaars for trade.
The Wanderers were first mentioned in an adventure hook in the 2020 Fantasy Flight Games Star Wars Roleplaying supplement, Starships and Speeders.
